basic.description: This course explores molecular biology and biotechnology of plant growth and development.
basic.subject: BOT
basic.title: Plant Molecular Biology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BOT 3015, BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L. Pre- or Corequisite: PCB 3063.
